page.title: 01New Thundersley
page.content:
The area is situated to the north of Thundersley, and the west of Rayleigh. It is a little over 50% mixed arable {farming.}Its southern 1km * 4km strip is a mixture of farmland,{housing, {industrial estate,}and{open spaces.} The north east corner comprises housing development along the A129 to the east of Rayleigh railway station.
We have decided to call the area New Thundersley as this is the largest urban development in the area.
The area is crossed north - south by the A130, and from east - west by the A127. These roads intersect in the centre of the area. In the north of the area lies the Liverpool St. rail line and the National Grid Electrical Distribution Station.
